Translations.Text: Mbega	ntubona	yuko	twarungitse	amashetani	hejuru	ya	bamwe batemera Imana y’ukuri baguma bakokeza kugira amabi
Rero ntubatware ningoga na ningoga abo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri kugira ngo bahanwe, mugabo	duharura igitigiri c’imisi yabo
Umusi tuzo begeranya abatinya Imana yabo y’ukuri tubajana kwa nyene imigisha yuko ari abashitsi bayo
Hanyuma	tuzoba	sunika	abantu	babi	mumuriro	udahera	witiriwe Jahannamu mugihe bazoba bafise inyota y’amazi y’umurengera
Ntabushobozi	bazoba	bafise	bwugu	sabirwa	atari	bamwe	bafashe amasezerano ku Mana nyene imigisha n’impuhwe zihagije
N’abahakanyi b’Imana bavuga bati:- nyene imigisha ihagije yarigiriye ikibondo
Ntankeka mwazanye ijambo rishavuza cane mukuvuga ibi vyose
Mukuvuga yuko nyene imigisha ifise ikibondo
Nkuko bivugira yuko nyene imigisha ihagije yoba ifise ikibondo
Kandi ntibibaho kwa nyene imigisha ihagije yuko yoba ifise ikibondo
Nta	n’umwe	ari	mw’Ijuru	no	kw’Isi	atari	uko	azoshika	kwa	nyene imigisha ihagije mugihe nawe ari umushumvyi wayo
N’umwe muribo azoshikira Imana yiwe k’umusi w’imperuka ari wenyene
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri nukugira ibikorwa vyiza, nyene imigisha ihagije izoba girira urukundo
Mu vy’ukuri iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu twarayoroheje mururimi rwawe rw’icarabu, kugira ngo ubashikirize ubutumwa bwayo kubatinya Imana yabo y’ukuri nukuba tuza kuriyo abantu bafise amatati
N’ibinjana bingahe vy’abantu twahoneje imbere yabo, mbega urabona mwo n’umwe muribo canke urumva n’imigambi yabo
